arn.documentation: Specifies an ARN template for the resource.

arnReference.documentation: Marks a string as containing an ARN.

unsignedPayload.documentation: Indicates that the request payload of a signed request is not to be used as part of the signature. Providing a list of strings will limit the effect of this trait to only specific authentication schemes by name.

content.name: CUSTOMER_CONTENT
content.documentation: Customer content means any software (including machine images), data, text, audio, video or images that customers or any customer end user transfers to AWS for processing, storage or hosting by AWS services in connection with the customer’s accounts and any computational results that customers or any customer end user derive from the foregoing through their use of AWS services.

account.name: CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_INFORMATION
account.documentation: Account information means information about customers that customers provide to AWS in connection with the creation or administration of customers’ accounts.

usage.name: SERVICE_ATTRIBUTES
usage.documentation: Service Attributes means service usage data related to a customer’s account, such as resource identifiers, metadata tags, security and access roles, rules, usage policies, permissions, usage statistics, logging data, and analytics.

tagging.name: TAG_DATA
tagging.documentation: Designates metadata tags applied to AWS resources.

permissions.name: PERMISSIONS_DATA
permissions.documentation: Designates security and access roles, rules, usage policies, and permissions.

data.documentation: Designates the target as containing data of a known classification level.

cognitoUserPoolsSettings.documentation: Configures an Amazon Cognito User Pools auth scheme.

controlPlane.documentation: Defines a service, resource, or operation as operating on the control plane.

dataPlane.documentation: Defines a service, resource, or operation as operating on the data plane.
